title: Level 7 Mastery Lee Sin Difficult

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Getting my level 7 mastery on Lee Sin is proving to be extremely difficult. The image for example, I understand my CS isn't too great but surely the kills and assists are enough to at least give me an S...

replies.body: Make sure to place a lot of wards, buy control wards, and farm/path effectively if you want to get an S. Unfortunately, most of the time getting an S is not playing optimally but playing for an S.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/173838415/201468736?tab=overview 
this is one of my recent games, and only got S-
also with cs how many objectives did you get? did you have full jg control or did they pull off a few cheeky steals? were you the one to get the towers inhibs etc.

Lee is over topped in power anyway, people on average get a score around 10/3/7 on lee,, which drops that at c or b rank, you need to do much better on lee than most other champs for a good rank because of how overplayed and strong he is, he is literally in more than just under 1/2 games and his kda is around double the average kda.
Because your CS is appalling lol, work on that.

114 CS in a 31 minute game. Especially on a champion that has a high volume of high skill mains. Don't underestimate the impact CS has. Those top percentage of scores more often than not have kills like what you got AND good CS. One or the other, just ain't gonna get you the best grades.
Just reach 7 mastery on Lee at 50k points only on jg :D
